title: Chesapeake Bay: Get Involved
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved           Get Involved        Looking for how to get involved? Browse through the website pages below or use the search tool to find opportunities. NPS Cenntenial: 1916-2016 The National Park Service celebrates its 100th Birthday in 2016. Check out all the great activities and events going on and join in the fun! Partners The Chesapeake Bay Office works alongside more than 170 different partners to help protect and preserve the largest estuary in the United States and manage the Captain John Smith Chesapeake National Historic Trail. Volunteer The Chesapeake Bay needs your help! There are countless opportunities to give back to the watershed that does so much for us, find out what you can do! Planning Learn about the planning of the Captain John Smith Chesapeake National Historic Trail and the Chesapeake Bay conservation and restoration efforts. Support Your Park The Chesapeake Bay watershed is home to 18,000,000 people. It needs your help and influence to keep it healthy and protect the resources. Learn how you can help.
